title: $:/Commander
text: \import [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Commander/Macro]] {{$:/plugins/kookma/commander/search/ui}} <$vars searchTerms={{{ [get[text]minlength{$:/plugins/kookma/commander/config/minlength}]~[[$:/errorCode:-23500]] }}} pattern="^\["> <$set name="filtertext" filter="[regexp]" value="[subfilter]" emptyValue="[!is[system]search]"> <$set name="searchfilter" filter="[get[text]match[yes]]" value="[subfilter!prefix[$:/temp/commander]]+[tag]" emptyValue="[subfilter!prefix[$:/temp/commander]]" > <$count filter="[subfilter!prefix[$:/temp/commander]!is[missing]]" /> matches <> <> <$vars> --- <>
